title: Oleksandr Safonov
text:
Oleksandr Safonov (; born 17 December 1991), is a <a href="professional">professional</a> <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who plays for <a href="FC%20LNZ%20Cherkasy">LNZ Cherkasy</a>.
Career.
He is the product of Youth Sportive Schools of FC Olimpik Kirovohrad and FC Ametyst Oleksandria.
Safonov played in the Ukrainian amateur and lower Leagues clubs and in February 2017 signed contract with Belarusian <a href="FC%20Slutsk">FC Slutsk</a>.
